https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6i6vvvauffnPIfS5V70jF63JAuf.jpg Marcelino is an eccentric, introverted painter and art professor who, approaching his sunset years, learns he has a disease that could render him blind at any moment. As he begins to put his emotional affairs in order, including his strained relationship with his daughter, he must face the inevitable. Cows Wearing Glasses
